name: Aloft (PokeNinjaGuy)
description:
Press X to start.

Use left &right arrows/ a & d to move.

Use X / K to drop balloons.

Use Z / L to enter doors.

Press R to restart a level.

Touch balloons to add a balloon, touch crystals to get all 3 instantly.

All art, music, sfx, and code made in the span of the week, by me.
